channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-4624] Remove and convert @deprecated RemoteExceptionHandler.decodeRemoteException calls
item.description: Moving issue w/ no recent movement out of 0.95

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: And on to 0.96

Hi stack,

I removed RemoteExceptionHandler class. I updated using places of methods. I hope I have done correctly.
I've changed the issue to patch available status so that the qabot can test the patch. I'm currently reviewing the patch.

Hi Jonathan Hsieh,

Is there any problem about path ? If there is , I can fix it.
Patch looks good but the bot had some failures. Not sure if they are related. can you check to see if the errors are? I can't get to this today but can tomorrow.

Hi Jonathan Hsieh

When I try to unpatch branch in my eclipse. It gives same error. I guess This error is not related with this patch.
